  • Constructor Details

    • BounceInsideRectangleTransformer

      public BounceInsideRectangleTransformer()
      Construct a new BounceInsideRectangleTransformer. Bounce the sprite inside of the screen. Initial velocity is (0.0 degrees, 0.0 screens)

      Precondition The sprite must be inside the given rectangle when this transformer is added. If it is not, behavior will undoubtedly not be what the programmer wants.

    • BounceInsideRectangleTransformer

      public BounceInsideRectangleTransformer(double minX, double minY, double maxX, double maxY, VelocityProvider modified)
      Construct a new BounceInsideRectangleTransformer. Bounce the sprite inside of the given rectangle.

      Precondition The sprite must be inside the given rectangle when this transformer is added. If it is not, behavior will undoubtedly not be what the programmer wants.

      Parameters:
      minX - the minimum x-coordinate of the sprite
      minY - the minimum y-coordinate of the sprite
      maxX - the maximum x-coordinate of the sprite
      maxY - the maximum y-coordinate of the sprite
      modified - the initial velocity of the sprite

    • BounceInsideRectangleTransformer

      public BounceInsideRectangleTransformer(VelocityProvider modified)
      Construct a new BounceInsideRectangleTransformer. Bounce the sprite inside of the screen.

      Precondition The sprite must be inside the given rectangle when this transformer is added. If it is not, behavior will undoubtedly not be what the programmer wants.

      Parameters:
      modified - the initial velocity of the sprite

  • Method Details

    • advance

      public void advance(double dT)
      Bounce if necessary. In any case, call the super advance to keep the velocity and offset calculations correct
      Specified by:
      advance in interface Transformer
      Overrides:

    • updateSprite

      public void updateSprite(Sprite bouncer)
      Update the location of the sprite. Bump it into the rectangle if necessary (keep from getting caught on an edge.
      Specified by:
      updateSprite in interface Transformer
      Overrides:
      updateSprite in class BounceTransformer
